channel.title: [Need help] Countdown for command!
channel.description:
To be honest, I am nog really seeking for help, I am hoping someone has the knowledge of how to do it. So here it comes:
I am making a command (owner+ only) ::event, spawning several NPC's at the home teleport. Now, I was wondering if anyone knows how to put a countdown on this command (showing up in screen just like ::update 10 p.e.), to give players the oppertunity to teleport to home because when the NPC's spawn (after using the command) and you [u]teleport[/u] to that location they are not shown in-game anymore.

item.title: [Need help] Countdown for command!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“fic7ion, post:3, topic:551583”][quote author=Zymus link=topic=670499.msg4483444#msg4483444 date=1432061774]

To be honest, I am nog really seeking for help,
I am hoping someone has the knowledge of how to do it.
So here it comes:

I am making a command (owner+ only) ::event, spawning several NPC’s at the home teleport.
Now, I was wondering if anyone knows how to put a countdown on this command (showing up in screen just like ::update 10 p.e.), to give players the
oppertunity to teleport to home because when the NPC’s spawn (after using the command) and you teleport to that location they are not shown in-game anymore.

So is what you’re saying that when you execute the command, it spawns the Npcs for the person executing the command, but when anyone else teleports there, they don’t show up?
[/quote]

Yes, exactly. Now, what I want is: to make the NPC’s show up when I enter the command AND also when people teleport to the location.[/quote]

Sounds like there’s a problem with your npc updating. Can you post your command?

Read full topic

item.title: [Need help] Countdown for command!

To be honest, I am nog really seeking for help,
I am hoping someone has the knowledge of how to do it.
So here it comes:

I am making a command (owner+ only) ::event, spawning several NPC’s at the home teleport.
Now, I was wondering if anyone knows how to put a countdown on this command (showing up in screen just like ::update 10 p.e.), to give players the
oppertunity to teleport to home because when the NPC’s spawn (after using the command) and you teleport to that location they are not shown in-game anymore.
[/quote]

So is what you’re saying that when you execute the command, it spawns the Npcs for the person executing the command, but when anyone else teleports there, they don’t show up?[/quote]

Yes, exactly. Now, what I want is: to make the NPC’s show up when I enter the command AND also when people teleport to the location.

Read full topic
